task_description: Task to arrange transportation to a clinic

nice_to_have: I would like assistance from the driver getting in and out of the vehicle.
I want to ensure the driver has experience with elderly passengers.
I prefer a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft for convenience.
Please include options for both one-way and round-trip transportation.
deal_breakers: Inadequate space for accompanying family members or caregivers
Drivers not trained in handling patients with disabilities

decision_factors: Time sensitivity of the clinic appointment

technical: Something modern that could connect to my phone
I think I need a GPS but I'm not sure how it works
A vehicle with good performance, whatever that means
non_technical: Drivers should be friendly but also know how to drive fast
I heard it's important for the driver to be trained, but I don't know why
It would be nice if the car looks nice, but I really don't know what to expect

must_meet: Transportation must arrive on time, though I'm not sure what that means exactly
The vehicle should be able to fit me and my things, but I'm not clear on the specifics
should_meet: I would like the driver to help me, but only if they feel like it
It should be affordable, but I can't really say what that means
nice_to_meet: If the vehicle has some cool features, that would be great
I think options for different types of rides would help, but Iâ€™m not sure
